function.name: mode_turnOff
function.description: This function is used to turn off a specific mode of a SmartThings device without stopping the device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to turn off the mode.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment to turn off the mode.

mode.description: The mode to turn off on the device.

predefinedMode.description: The predefined mode to turn off on the device.
